title: Project-Based Learning for Diagnosing and Improving Misconceptions in Engineering Metallurgy Concepts

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic metallurgy terminology and physical properties
context.additional_context: Blended learning program in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments with flexible scheduling for working professionals

learning_goals: Diagnose and correct three major misconceptions about metal crystalline structures and phase transition processes
Submit project results identifying peers' misconceptions through concept mapping and diagnostic assessments with 80% accuracy
Explain causal relationships in metallurgical phenomena in three or more stages through blended learning activities (video lectures, group discussions, assignments)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
